Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::The Skyscorchers/Gigatron/Vulois:::

::As the ship takes off, my bots remember things.  Vulois remembers Battera 
and Cybershark, and tears come to his eyes when he remembers Soundwave.  The 
Skyscorchers have memories of Tranquility, Datastreak, HeraldAngel, and their 
lost comrade Eagle Eye. Gigatron remembers the blessed Child, and his first 
friend, Lord Defection::
Vulois: I christen this vessel the Peace Train!
::They fly for a long time, but finally reach the planet Draziw.  They are 
welcomed by an old bot and his mate, who had not lost her beauty in her old 
age::
Gigatron: King Bluestreak and Queen Andromeda i presume?
::Andromeda smiles::
Andromeda: Yes, you have reached our home.
Bluestreak: We had visions of your arrival, and we welcome you with open 
arms. Things haven't been the same around here since our son Orion left.
::And so the Keepers and Vulois finally acheived peace.  they lived out the 
rest of their days on Draziw with Bluestreak and Andromeda::

Well I've been happy lately
Thinkin' about the good things to come
And i beleive it could be
Something good has begun
For out on the edge of darkness
There lies a Peace Train
Peace Train tame this country
And bring me home again- Cat Stevens

In loving memory of Minime_316, whose hopes and dreams made this possible.  
Wherever he is, hopefully he is at peace.

--part1_24.1358a9ba.282e1357_boundary
